resources.string: To see if a product is recyclable, simply scan it\'s barcode
or type in the barcode number.
Additional informations (for advanced users and definitely optional)
A simple name to identify the element
A more complete description of the element so that other users can easily identify it.
Give a name to the element.
Add a photo of the element.
There was an error while saving this element. Check your internet connection and try again.
There was an error while editing this element. Check your internet connection and try again.
There was an error while uploading the picture. Check your internet connection and try again.
Hey! It seems that this product is not present yet in our database. \n\nDo you want to take a minute and add it yourself ?
Please take a picture of the product
Please fill all fields and add a picture of the whole product.
You don\'t seem to have any active internet connection. Please look into that =)
:( \tThis product does not have any element attached.
Elements are the way to tell people which parts of the product can be recycled. \n\n Add at least one Element to this product.
You forgot to type in the Barcode number.
First take a picture of the Element.
Do you want to add another Element?

The Element Wizard is a convenient way to add Elements to a Product. It is faster than the traditional method but only enables to take a picture and specify if the Element is recyclable. If you like to add additional informations to the elements you create, we recommand that you disable this option.
